mapper.sql: id, license_car, enter_time, leave_time, car_type, park_id, paymoney, del_flag, science_id
mapper.insert:
insert into parking_car
id,
license_car,
enter_time,
leave_time,
car_type,
park_id,
paymoney,
del_flag,
science_id,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{license_car,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{enter_time,jdbcType=DATE},
#{leave_time,jdbcType=DATE},
#{car_type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{park_id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{paymoney,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{del_flag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{science_id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update parking_car
license_car = #{license_car,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
enter_time = #{enter_time,jdbcType=DATE},
leave_time = #{leave_time,jdbcType=DATE},
car_type = #{car_type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
park_id = #{park_id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
paymoney = #{paymoney,jdbcType=INTEGER},
del_flag = #{del_flag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
science_id = #{science_id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update parking_car set license_car = #{license_car,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enter_time = #{enter_time,jdbcType=DATE}, leave_time = #{leave_time,jdbcType=DATE}, car_type = #{car_type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, park_id = #{park_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, paymoney = #{paymoney,jdbcType=INTEGER}, del_flag = #{del_flag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, science_id = #{science_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT id) FROM parking_car WHERE parking_car.day = #{end_day} AND parking_car.science_id = #{science_id}

SELECT COUNT(parking_car.id) FROM parking_car left join scenicspot ON scenicspot.id = parking_car.science_id WHERE day = #{end_day} AND scenicspot.id = 1 AND ( ( parking_car.enter_time >= CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(#{end_day},'%Y-%m-%d'),' 8:00:00') AND parking_car.leave_time <= CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(#{end_day},'%Y-%m-%d'),' 8:59:59') ) OR ( parking_car.enter_time >= CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(#{end_day},'%Y-%m-%d'),' 8:00:00') AND parking_car.enter_time <= CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(#{end_day},'%Y-%m-%d'),' 8:59:59') AND parking_car.leave_time >= CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(#{end_day},'%Y-%m-%d'),' 8:59:59') ) OR ( parking_car.enter_time <= CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(#{end_day},'%Y-%m-%d'),' 8:00:00') AND parking_car.leave_time >= CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(#{end_day},'%Y-%m-%d'),' 8:00:00') AND parking_car.leave_time <= CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(#{end_day},'%Y-%m-%d'),' 8:59:59') ) OR ( parking_car.enter_time <= CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(#{end_day},'%Y-%m-%d'),' 8:00:00') AND parking_car.leave_time >= CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(#{end_day},'%Y-%m-%d'),' 8:59:59') ) ) AND parking_car.del_flag = 1
UNION ALL
SELECT COUNT(parking_car.id) FROM parking_car left join scenicspot ON scenicspot.id = parking_car.science_id WHERE day = #{end_day} AND scenicspot.id = 1 AND ( ( parking_car.enter_time >= CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(#{end_day},'%Y-%m-%d'),' 9:00:00') AND parking_car.leave_time <= CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(#{end_day},'%Y-%m-%d'),' 9:59:59') ) OR ( parking_car.enter_time >= CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(#{end_day},'%Y-%m-%d'),' 9:00:00') AND parking_car.enter_time <= CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(#{end_day},'%Y-%m-%d'),' 9:59:59') AND parking_car.leave_time >= CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(#{end_day},'%Y-%m-%d'),' 9:59:59') ) OR ( parking_car.enter_time <= CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(#{end_day},'%Y-%m-%d'),' 9:00:00') AND parking_car.leave_time >= CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(#{end_day},'%Y-%m-%d'),' 9:00:00') AND parking_car.leave_time <= CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(#{end_day},'%Y-%m-%d'),' 9:59:59') ) OR ( parking_car.enter_time <= CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(#{end_day},'%Y-%m-%d'),' 9:00:00') AND parking_car.leave_time >= CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(#{end_day},'%Y-%m-%d'),' 9:59:59') ) ) AND parking_car.del_flag = 1
